dbi.Result

Authors:
The D DBI project

interface Result;
Manage a result set from a database query.

abstract Row fetchRow();
Fetch one from the result set.

Returns:
Null if the last row has already been fetched or a Row object otherwise.

abstract Row[] fetchAll();
Fetch all results into a Row array

Returns:
An array of Row objects that can be empty.

abstract void finish();
Finish resultset. This should be called if you terminate a query without fetching all results.
